sub_title: Supply Chain Coordinator - Process Improvement - Cold Chain - Cost Optimization
summary:
Living and working in four different countries provided José a flexible and multicultural mindset that helps him adapts quickly to new environments. Furthermore implication, a results -driven mindset and enjoying new challenges let him find his place everywhere he worked. During his career José developed strong analytical and communication skills.

He has joined international projects in Pharmaceutical and Hi-Tech in Netherlands, Spain, France and UK, ensuring accu-rate stock levels, evaluating 3PL performance, aiming to a smooth flow of information, products and raw materials, monitoring KPIs, tracking shipments, improving processes, optimizing costs and troubleshooting on storage and shipping issues.

Currently José is looking for a long term challenge in Supply Chain with an international scope

education.degree_name: Licenciado en Organización y Técnica del Seguro
education.field_of_study: Seguros, Cauciones, Transporte de Mercancías, Comercio Exterior

profile_positions.description:
•	Process B2B orders and samples and book reservations for laboratories, hospi-tals, universities and pharma companies
•	Ensuring that all samples, reservations and orders are processed, evaluated and booked within SLAs and KPIs and accurately in SAP PRP & PRE.
•	Keeping a detailed and accurate record of the ongoing Serum situation for South region customers: Italy, Portugal and Spain, providing inputs for improvement of Supply Chain processes
•	Master different commercial tools (SalesForce), communication tools (CRM, Avaya) and softwares (SAP-ERPs : PRE & NEXT)
•	Developing partnership with Sales Organisation to ensure administrative support
•	Handle after-sales requests (Expediting requests, stock navigation, carriers, cer-tificates, confirmation of Delivery dates, tracking shipments)
•	Troubleshooting on shipping issues, inventory and reservations discrepancies.
profile_positions.title: Serum Specialist - Cold Chain Distribution Europe

profile_positions.description:
•	Coordinating the O2C process, checking L/Cs, ensuring workflow within KPIs and SLAs and tracking shipments from Taiwan, USA, China and Europe.
•	Manage the day to day efficient transportation of outgoing and incoming products in accordance with international transportation and compliance rules & regulations, coordinating storage and distribution to stores and retailers.
•	Monitor, review and troubleshoot inventory transactions on a daily basis, identifying any irregularities. Provide monthly reconciliation of inventory sub-ledger.
•	Receiving deliveries and ensuring that the stock delivered matches supporting do-cumentation and reporting discrepancies to stakeholders.
•	Setting up, planning and performing cycle counts by product or group of products. 
•	Performing invoice control, reconciliations, bookkeeping and insurance claims
•	Negotiating with suppliers. Supporting new projects requirements.
•	Interacting with other departments for improvement of processes.
•	Supporting the material flow processes providing operational day-to-day activities for Planning/ Scheduling (OMP), Demand Planning, Inventory Management.
•	Development of supply chain plans and cost models and coordinated plan imple-mentation with other departments in Spain, France and Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Operations Support Coordinator

company.name: MGM Integrated Solutions (Projects for MSD, Aspen & Amphastar)

profile_positions.company: MGM Integrated Solutions (Projects for MSD, Aspen & Amphastar)
profile_positions.description:
Created and implemented key performance indicators for Supply Chain activities
• Created, implemented and controlled KPIs for Supply Chain activities, designed cost models and coordinate plan implementation with other departments in Spain, France and The Netherlands. • Ensured GMP & GDP compliance in Order Management processes. Also implemen-tation of Lean Six Sigma practices • Participated in the implementation of Salesforce application as main communica-tion channel with customers, suppliers, forwarders, 3PLs and internal departments. Also as storage back-up for orders, validations, certificates of analysis, test results, reports, quotes and ad hoc information. • Joined a Record Management Project to increase availability and easy access to GMP documentation: tests, validations, certifications, qualifications and SOPs. • Tested and validated SAP Migration project to interconnect Inventory Systems in Spain, France, Portugal and Netherlands • Provided close support to Customer Care, Sales and Logistics teams to implement a new shipments tracking tool • Implemented shipping improvements in the O2C process for research centers, hospitals and clinics. We aimed to provide a customized delivery service under GMP & GDP framework for serum orders and samples
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Analyst / GMP Compliance Controller

profile_positions.description:
•	Reviewed and assess clients' financial statements
•	Performed credit risk management review for clients and gave deliberation to management. 
•	Provided credit and risk rating recommendations based on compliance.
•	Managed warranty documents database and required filling documents. Handled and maintained leasing insurance. Assisted with bad debt collection.
profile_positions.title: Risk Analyst / Credit Collector

profile_positions.description:
•	Focused on developing and supporting a 120 SMEs and Key Accounts portfolio
•	Managed new and existing partners and merchants, evaluating their business plans and financial statements, monitoring KPIs, identifying financial risks proactively, setting up credit limits, improving SLAs and resolving delivery issues.
•	Performed KYC, SOX and AML controls to anticipate customer´s operating profile and on-going credit worthiness. CDD analysis.
•	Created new processes for Risk Control and Collections optimization.
•	Developed AML and Fraud detection tasks, providing critical inputs on Information Security and Compliance to IT, Marketing and Customer Service.
•	Evaluated the merchants' financial profile to understand operating performance and on-going credit worthiness; a review of the merchants' history and conduct during the relationship, their business activity and future business plans.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Banking Officer

profile_positions.description:
•	Assisted clients across whole loan application process and performed CDD analysis
•	Identify potential areas of risk in ecommerce processes and investigated issues with credit card payments. Performed compliance with AML and FSA regulations.
•	Determined loan eligibility of clients, focused on analyzing financial statements, lien searches and credit bureaus and based on KYC and Compliance requirements.
•	Promoted to Risk Detection Unit. Conducted in-depth portfolio research on overdue customers and addressed related risks and issues to Business development. 
•	Collaborated with the implementation of Personal Banking Solutions and Compliance programs, handling quite sensitive financial and personal documentation
•	Minimized financial risk to the unit by assessing and advising on creditworthiness, potential fraud and AML and SOX warnings from new and existing clients.
profile_positions.title: Personal Banking Advisor / Insurance & Collections Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Investigated claims to determine whether coverage is provided, established    liability and verified damages in fleets, theft, Hulls, cargo and fire coverages.
•	Consulting with insureds in regards to activities and programs available to control losses and improve safety. Managed and monitored underwriting rules and guide-lines, insurance laws and rating annual rules.
•	Identified and appropriately handles suspicious claims and with third party subroga-tion potential. Investigated lost and/or stolen products and containers.
•	Established and maintained accurate reserves on all assigned files.
•	Processed claims and incidents by gathering and analyzing all facts and documenta-tion to determine liability in a timely manner, in accordance to KPIs.
profile_positions.title: Claims Adjuster / Property Underwriter
